A simple way to test a method that process info coming from a Reader 
is to feed it from a StringReader.


   Reader dataSource = new StringReader ("line1\nline2");
   int nofLines = countLinesIn (dataSource);
   assertEquals (2, nofLines);

You'll find a more complete example at   
     http://users.vnet.net/wwake/xp/xp0002b/index.shtml
     http://users.vnet.net/wwake/xp/xp0003a/index.shtml


Alain Ravet
